short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Автоматическая бронь на сайте https://app.voxy.com/ от Вашего учителя!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When a user receives a message from a teacher by mail, messenger and others. This user can follow the link with the identifier (lesson ID). After clicking on the link like "https://app.voxy.com/v2/#/live-instruction/group-classes?id=453452" - the user will immediately book a lesson with this identifier. This functionality is not in the original application of the site, and it takes too long to search every time with all the filters (about 5 minutes). This addon was custom made to increase conversions
